--- title: "Sheffield Half Marathon" date: "2011-05-08" author: "Adrian Joseph" image: https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport_small/2011-05-08_SHEFFIELD_HALF_MARATHON/img/00.png categories: [race report, run] format: html lightbox: match: auto effect: fade desc-position: right loop: false --- ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport_small/2011-05-08_SHEFFIELD_HALF_MARATHON/img/00.png) This was my home race, with a finish in the new Sheffield (UK) Stadium. I do not remember much of this race, just that I found out how a half marathon was way longer than a 10K, which I think you do not really need to run it to figure it out... ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
